query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `sn_images` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `serial_number` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `image_url` varchar(1000) NOT NULL,
  `thumbnail_url` varchar(1000),
  `measurement_points` json,
  `defect_locations` json,
  `analysis_result` enum('ok', 'ng', 'warning', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending',
  `quality_score` decimal(5,2),
  `defects_found` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `measurements_count` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `camera_id` int,
  `batch_job_id` int,
  `source` enum('camera', 'upload', 'api', 'batch_job') DEFAULT 'upload',
  `product_id` int,
  `production_line_id` int,
  `workstation_id` int,
  `captured_at` timestamp,
  `analyzed_at` timestamp,
  `analyzed_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_sn` (`serial_number`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_result` (`analysis_result`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_camera` (`camera_id`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_product` (`product_id`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_line` (`production_line_id`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_captured` (`captured_at`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `sn_images` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `serial_number` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `image_url` varchar(1000) NOT NULL,
  `thumbnail_url` varchar(1000),
  `measurement_points` json,
  `defect_locations` json,
  `analysis_result` enum('ok', 'ng', 'warning', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending',
  `quality_score` decimal(5,2),
  `defects_found` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `measurements_count` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `camera_id` int,
  `batch_job_id` int,
  `source` enum('camera', 'upload', 'api', 'batch_job') DEFAULT 'upload',
  `product_id` int,
  `production_line_id` int,
  `workstation_id` int,
  `captured_at` timestamp,
  `analyzed_at` timestamp,
  `analyzed_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_sn` (`serial_number`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_result` (`analysis_result`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_camera` (`camera_id`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_product` (`product_id`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_line` (`production_line_id`),
  KEY `idx_sn_images_captured` (`captured_at`)
);
